title: Career Girl: An Office Romance
description: Karina, a 24 year old junior analyst and maths genius is pleased with her career progression so far. She’s confident and a little smug that she’ll ace the forthcoming interview for her dream job. Unfortunately at the interview she encounters Marcel, an arrogant and ruthless banker, who grills her out of her comfort zone. And then rejects her for the role. She avows to hate him and hopes to avoid him in future. However, when they coincidentally encounter each other at social events, Karina isn’t sure if she really does hate him, or is she falling for him? And is the arrogant Marcel interested in her? This is an Enemy turned Lovers romance between a strong heroine and an arrogant hero.
author: Sienna Montgomery
